title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 152.1 - Registering muskrat marshes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 152.1 - Registering muskrat marshes

State Regulations

An owner or lessee of a marsh area registered with this
department pursuant to the provisions of section 11-1109 of the Fish and

Wildlife Law may make application to the department and be granted a permit to
take muskrats on such registered marsh premises throughout the legal muskrat
trapping period on such marsh by trapping in any manner, provided that such
trapping shall be done in a manner to preclude any damage to muskrat houses, feeding houses or structures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
152.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
